article: What is school life like for a schoolboy? A schoolboy's life is in preparation for the real battle of life. It is also full of interest. One of the first important  _  in a schoolboy's life is to get as much knowledge and good mind-training as he can . His main business in school is to  _  . He has to read the books that he is  _  in the classes . He has to do the homework assigned to him. Another part in a school boy's life is the strict discipline . At school there are  _  . If he breaks them, he will get punished. This strict discipline is very  _  for him when he enters society. It can teach him some very necessary virtues on the road to a  _  life . School is a place for a schoolboy to learn  _  the life in society is like. For in the classroom and on the playground, he has to be with his schoolmates and not members of his  _  . He cannot do as he does at home. He soon learns the lessons of give-and-take, to be polite and to  _  for others , which is also the way when he has to carry himself in society . A schoolboy's life has its interesting and healthy part. Games and physical exercise not only  _  him strong , but also teach him how to work with others in the spirit of team work .
